section.heading: Uses of Resident Welfare Fund.
section.text: *NOTE: This codification is not the most current, due to recent law changes. To see the current law (including emergency and temporary legislation, if relevant) click this link: Current Version*
The Fund shall be used for the following purposes, in order of priority:

para.text: To stock the commissaries of District correctional facilities;
To repay the initial appropriation used to finance the Fund; and
To provide goods and services that benefit the general resident population at District correctional facilities, as determined by the Resident Welfare Fund Committee established in § 24-284.
